titleStmt.title: Sion in distress, or, The groans of the Protestant Chruch [sic]
titleStmt.author: Keach, Benjamin, 1640-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Larkin for Enoch Prosser,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing, NUC pre-1956 imprints to Benjamin Keach.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
